name: Construct 3 Active Ragdoll thing
description:
i have not seen any active ragdolls made in construct so i thought i would make one 

you can throw boxes and stuff its pretty buggy 

W - jump

A,D - move

S - Down

Z - Ragdoll Mode

X - Active Ragdoll Mode

G -Spawn Box at mouse

Left MouseButton - Left Arm

Right MouseButton - Right Arm

middle MouseButton - Spawn THing

P  -   Better fullscreen
